Description:
Can you build a supply chain that’s more efficient, resilient, and sustainable all at once?

In this preview of the Building Resilient & Responsible Supply Chains episode of Accelerating Sustainability Together, Cliff Henson, Corporate Vice President of Cloud Supply Chain at Microsoft, Liz Comley, Director of Supply Chain Sustainability at Microsoft, and Nico De Golia, Director of Sustainable Logistics, Cloud Supply Chain at Microsoft, share how they’re transforming one of the world’s most complex global supply chains from mine to datacenter using smarter data, automation, and supplier collaboration.

Watch the full episode to see how Microsoft is redefining sustainable supply chain operations: https://msft.it/YT-1080186-09042025

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
Title: Building Resilient & Responsible Supply Chains | Accelerating Sustainability Together
Author: Microsoft Cloud
